name: 3-Ingredient Breakfast Cookies 🥗
description: These 3-ingredient breakfast cookies are the ultimate grab-and-go treat for busy mornings. Packed with oats and banana, they offer a sweet and satisfying start to your day.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, combine the oats and bananas, mashing the banana and mixing until well-incorporated.
Stir in your mix-in(s) of choice.
Scoop the dough onto the prepared baking sheet and bake for 12 minutes.
